Sentencas: In this report, a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system with fuel recycling was proposed, and its generation efficiency was evaluated.
Titulo: Generation efficiency of solid oxide fuel cell system with fuel recycling

Sentencas: In the system, ail of the fuel supplied is utilized for generation, and the open-circuit voltage is enhanced by the removal of CO2 and H2O from recycled fuel.
Titulo: Generation efficiency of solid oxide fuel cell system with fuel recycling

Sentencas: Fuel recycling improves the generation efficiency of the SOFC system if the energy required for the separation of CO2 and H2O could be reduced to close to the separation free-energy.
Titulo: Generation efficiency of solid oxide fuel cell system with fuel recycling
